Text:
Thanks mister,
but imo powerarchiver is a really bloated software because it provides inbuilt preview.

a person with tweaking-fetish should stick to 7zip.

While I agree with you for the most part, PA does have one killer feature which makes it a must-have for me:  the ability to automatically convert archives from one format to another.  Using this feature to convert from ZIP to 7-Zip saves me a TON of space and allows me to fit much more on a DVD!
